Class ScoreIndicator

java.lang.Object
com.fy916.bubblebobble.gaming.elements.ObjectFeature
com.fy916.bubblebobble.gaming.elements.GameObject
com.fy916.bubblebobble.gaming.elements.movingelements.MovingObject
com.fy916.bubblebobble.gaming.elements.movingelements.ScoreIndicator
public class ScoreIndicator extends MovingObject
A ScoreIndicator is the indicator that appears when a Fruit is picked by the hero showing the score this fruit provides.
It extends MovingObject.
